meanings.definition: A substance that induces inflammation in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The encephalitogen triggered swelling in the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the effects of the encephalitogen on brain cells.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled encephalitogen in the lab, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an encephalitogen, causing a storm of emotions in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The encephalitogen acted like a fire, spreading inflammation throughout the brain.
